br.octahedron.cotopaxi.controller
Class InputController

java.lang.Object
  br.octahedron.cotopaxi.controller.InputController
Direct Known Subclasses:
Controller, TemplateInterceptor
public abstract class InputController
extends Object

A base class that provides access to input and output attributes for a controller, but can't render/redirect a response

Author:
Danilo Queiroz - daniloqueiroz@octahedron.com.br

in

protected final String in(String name)
Get an input parameter with the given key. Input parameter can be parameters passed using both POST and GET method, or parameters passed at the url address, with leading and trailing white spaces removed; The same as call in(name,true);

Parameters:
name - The parameter's name
Returns:
The parameter's value if exists, or null if there's no input parameter with the given name.
See Also:
in(String, boolean)

in

protected final String in(String name,
                          boolean shouldTrim)
Get an input parameter with the given key. Input parameter can be parameters passed using both POST and GET method, or parameters passed at the url address;

Parameters:
name - The parameter's name
shouldTrim - true if should remove leading and trailing white spaces, false to return the raw String
Returns:
The parameter's value if exists, or null if there's no input parameter with the given name.

in

protected final <T> T in(String name,
                         Converter<T> converter)
              throws ConvertionException
Get an input parameter with the given key, and convert it using the given converter. Input parameter can be parameters passed using both POST and GET method, or parameters passed at the url address, with leading and trailing white spaces removed;

Parameters:
name - The parameter's name
converter - The converter to be used to convert input value
Returns:
The parameter's value if exists, or null if there's no input parameter with the given name.
Throws:
ConvertionException - If the convert can't convert the input
See Also:
Converter

values

protected final Collection<String> values(String name)
Get all the values for a input parameter with the given key. It's useful for checkbox input, for example. If there's no value for the given input parameter, returns an empty collection.

Parameters:
name - The parameter's name
Returns:
A Collection with all values for the given parameter.

session

protected final Object session(String key)
Gets an object, with the given key, from session.

Parameters:
key - the object's key
Returns:
The object with the given key if exists or null if there's no object in the session with the given key.

header

protected final String header(String name)
Gets an header attribute

Parameters:
name - the header's name
Returns:
The header's value if exists or null if there's no header with the given name.

cookie

Gets a cookie's value

Parameters:
name - the cookie's name
Returns:
the cookie's value if exists or null if theres no cookie with the given name

currentUser

protected final String currentUser()
Gets the current user for request, if exists. This method is useful for authentication mechanisms

Returns:
the user's name, or null if not set

isAuthorized

protected final boolean isAuthorized()
Verify if this request was marked as authorized This method is useful for authentication mechanisms

Returns:
true if the request was marked as authorized, false otherwise.

isAnswered

protected final boolean isAnswered()
Checks if the request was already answered
